description:
It`s the season of love as a new boy comes to the Naria girls school, and they`re all instantly attracted to him.  But their love falls apart when he turns into a monster and uses the magic mirror to cast a spell.  This time the girls are transformed them into a boyfriend who loves huge breasts, asking his girlfriend`s strange father for her hand i marriage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Tenkousei wa Amakute Kiken na Koi no Wana Nari?
The Transfer Student Is a Sweet Trap of Love?
転校生は甘くて危険な恋の罠なり?
